languages.text: {n}Пошатываясь, сслит отползает в сторону, не моргая глядя на вас — то ли ожидая подлого удара в спину, то ли избегая смотреть на кого-либо еще.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пошатываясь, сслит отползает в сторону, не моргая глядя на вас — то ли ожидая подлого удара в спину, то ли избегая смотреть на кого-либо еще.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пошатываясь, сслит отползает в сторону, не моргая глядя на вас — то ли ожидая подлого удара в спину, то ли избегая смотреть на кого-либо еще.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}
{n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}

{n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}
{n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}

languages.text: {n}蛇人摇摇晃晃地离开了，眼睛一眨不眨地直视着你。要么是觉得你会打算突然袭击，要么是为了避免与其他人有任何眼神接触。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇人摇摇晃晃地离开了，眼睛一眨不眨地直视着你。要么是觉得你会打算突然袭击，要么是为了避免与其他人有任何眼神接触。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Sslyth weicht schwankend von dir zurück. Er blickt ohne zu blinzeln direkt in deine Augen. Entweder weil er einen plötzlichen Angriff erwartet oder weil er niemand anderen ansehen will.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Sslyth weicht schwankend von dir zurück. Er blickt ohne zu blinzeln direkt in deine Augen. Entweder weil er einen plötzlichen Angriff erwartet oder weil er niemand anderen ansehen will.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Chancelant, le Sslyth s'éloigne sans vous quitter des yeux ni même cligner des paupières, mais vous ne sauriez dire si c'est pour parer à toute attaque éventuelle, ou tout simplement pour éviter de regarder qui que ce soit d'autre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Chancelant, le Sslyth s'éloigne sans vous quitter des yeux ni même cligner des paupières, mais vous ne sauriez dire si c'est pour parer à toute attaque éventuelle, ou tout simplement pour éviter de regarder qui que ce soit d'autre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Reculando, el Sslyth se aleja reptando mientras te observa sin pestañear, ya sea porque espera un golpe repentino o para evitar mirar a nadie más a los ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reculando, el Sslyth se aleja reptando mientras te observa sin pestañear, ya sea porque espera un golpe repentino o para evitar mirar a nadie más a los ojos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然の攻撃を予期してか、あるいは他の誰とも目を合わせないようにするためか、ススリスはまばたきもせずにまっすぐこちらを見ながらそそくさと逃げていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然の攻撃を予期してか、あるいは他の誰とも目を合わせないようにするためか、ススリスはまばたきもせずにまっすぐこちらを見ながらそそくさと逃げていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yalpalayan Sslyth, sürünerek uzaklaşıyor. Uzaklaşırken gözlerini kırpmadan, doğrudan sana bakıyor. Ya ani bir saldırı beklediği ya da bir başkasıyla göz teması kurmaktan kaçınmak istediği için böyle yapıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reeling, the Sslyth slithers away while looking straight at you without blinking, either in expectation of a sudden strike or to avoid making eye contact with anyone else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sslyth, yalpalaya yalpalaya sürünerek uzaklaşıyor. Uzaklaşırken, göz kırpmadan doğrudan sana bakıyor: Ya ani bir saldırı beklediği ya da bir başkasıyla göz teması kurmaktan kaçınmak istediği için.{/n}
